details.architecture: Follows Decision 001 — argparse register(subparsers) pattern, stdlib only, uses shared utils
features: file size filtering (--min-size, --max-size) with human-readable units
modification time filtering (--newer, --older) with relative and absolute specs
content search inside files (--content) with regex
verbose output with format_table() showing size and mtime (--verbose)
graceful permission error handling (skip + warn to stderr)
